meanings.definition: A tropical tree of the pea family, native to South America.
meanings.sent1: The coumarou provides shade with its broad leaves.
meanings.sent2: In the rainforest, the coumarou tree is a common sight.
meanings.sent3: The monkeys love to swing from the branches of the coumarou.
meanings.sent4: The coumarou stands tall like a guardian of the jungle.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green of the coumarou leaves is a symbol of life in the forest.

meanings.definition: The fragrant wood of the coumarou tree.
meanings.sent1: The aroma of coumarou wood filled the room.
meanings.sent2: Craftsmen carve beautiful sculptures from coumarou.
meanings.sent3: The scent of coumarou wood made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The coumarou wood whispered stories of the forest.
meanings.sent5: Burning coumarou wood releases a calming fragrance into the air.

meanings.definition: A resinous substance obtained from the coumarou tree, used in perfumery.
meanings.sent1: The coumarou resin added a unique touch to the perfume.
meanings.sent2: Perfumers treasure the essence of coumarou in their creations.
meanings.sent3: The coumarou resin sparkled like tiny jewels in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her perfume was as alluring as the coumarou resin itself.
meanings.sent5: The scent of coumarou resin lingered in the air, enchanting all who passed by.
